content: शुक्ल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [शुच्-लुक् कुत्वम्] White, pure, bright; as in शुक्लापांग <ab>q. v.</ab> --क्लः {@--1@} A white colour. {@--2@} The bright or light half of a lunar month. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. --क्लं {@--1@} Silver. {@--2@} A disease of the white part of the eye. {@--3@} Fresh butter. {@--4@} Sour gruel
